channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The problem with ‘human in the loop’ AI? Often, it’s the humans
item.description: New studies show AI tools beating human professionals in law and advertising—challenging the assumption that human-AI collaboration always produces th...

item.title: ‘Customers don’t care about AI’ — they just want to boost cash flow and make ends meet, Intuit CEO says
item.description: "A business is trying to get more customers. They're trying to manage their customers, sell them more services."

item.title: Exelon CEO: The ‘warning lights are on’ for U.S. electric grid resilience and utility prices amid AI demand surge
item.description: The U.S. needs more generation, including renewables, and greater efficiencies to keep the grid from breaking down Exelon CEO and President Calvin But...

item.title: ‘Fodder for a recession’: Top economist Mark Zandi warns about so many Americans ‘already living on the financial edge’ in the K-shaped economy
item.description: The latest JOLTS report shows hiring stuck at 3.2% and quits falling again as the Fed prepares to cut rates.

item.title: Jamie Dimon taps Jeff Bezos, Michael Dell and Ford CEO Jim Farley to advise JPMorgan’s $1.5 trillion national-security initiative
item.description: Former military commanders, politicians, and one of Warren Buffet’s top stock pickers also comprise the advisory group.

item.title: Rising long-term Treasury yields can be 'very worrisome' for stocks: strategist
